text: Sociedad Deportiva Buelna is a football team based in Los Corrales de Buelna in the autonomous community of Cantabria. Founded in 1948, the team plays in Regional Preferente. The club's home ground is Estadio Municipal, which has a capacity of 5,500 spectators. == Season to season== {| |valign="top" width=0%| {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#f0f6fa;" !Season !Division !Place !Copa del Rey |- |style="background:#CECE1B;"|1948–81 |style="background:#CECE1B;"|Regional |style="background:#CECE1B;"|— !style="background:#efefef;"| |- |style="background:#FF7F00;"|1981/82 |style="background:#FF7F00;"|3ª |style="background:#FF7F00;"|18th |style="background:#efefef;"| |- |style="background:#CECE1B;"|1982/83 |style="background:#CECE1B;"|Regional |style="background:#CECE1B;"|— !style="background:#efefef;"| |- |style="background:#FF7F00;"|1983/84 |style="background:#FF7F00;"|3ª |style="background:#FF7F00;"|20th |style="background:#efefef;"| |- |style="background:#CECE1B;"|1984/85 |style="background:#CECE1B;"|Regional |style="background:#CECE1B;"|— !style="background:#efefef;"| |- |style="background:#CECE1B;"|1985/86 |style="background:#CECE1B;"|Regional |style="background:#CECE1B;"|— !style="background:#efefef;"| |- |style="background:#FF7F00;"|1986/87 |style="background:#FF7F00;"|3ª |style="background:#FF7F00;"|20th |style="background:#efefef;"| |- |style="background:#CECE1B;"|1987/88 |style="background:#CECE1B;"|Reg.
